analysis.description:
Donut.finishGames (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol#317-335) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- bn == block.number
r in Donut.testRandom (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol) is a local variable never initialiazed
r in Donut._getGameResults (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol#391) is a local variable never initialiazed
r in Donut.finishGames (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol#319-321) is a local variable never initialiazed

Cylinder.finish has external calls inside a loop:
	- ! d.depositor.send(reward) (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol#114-119)

Cylinder.withdraw has external calls inside a loop:
	- deposit.depositor.transfer(msg.value + ret) (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol#169-170)

Cylinder.withdraw has external calls inside a loop:
	- SERVICE.transfer(dep - ret) (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol#170-173)

Donut.fallback has external calls inside a loop:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - bet) (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol#266-267)
Parameter '_idx' of Donut.getCylinder (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol#358) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_deps' of Donut._copyDeps (/unique_chucks/24/0x7d916724a14ede929aa308c2a3e18e9d05ba570a.sol#448-449) is not in mixedCase
